name: David Ramirez
text: It's Japan.     Were you there when I talked about randomly coming across some extremely sketchy stuff in one of the stores? It wasn't some back alley place either, it was one of those multi storey shops.    So... Not surprising. Terrible, but not surprising.    The article opens with a bit of bad writing. There's a sentence about him being arrested "overseas" and I thought it meant he was caught outside Japan but the writer meant he was overseas... in Japan. It's like. Why even put that word in there?
